name: S-1
description:
After a voyage into the mysterious depths of unexplored space, the spaceship S-1, commanded by a still inexperienced pilot, gets lost. Surrounded by a horde of deadly aliens, the pilot must fight for his survival, and wait for the help from his mothership. But, will the help ever come..? 
A simple 1-bit endless space shooter. This is just a proof of concept / very early version of the game. I'm planning to add more enemy types, bosses, power ups as well as many more features. 

The game possibly contains many glitches and bugs, so any feedback is welcome. 

Music: https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack

Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/acknowledge-tt-brk-font.html
